title: In Case You Didn't Know, Feds Say Raising A Child Is Expensive
teaser: How much does it cost to raise a child these days? The government says it costs $245,340. That's for a child born in 2013 and covers the period from birth to age 18. College not included.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
